name: Bubble Fusion
description:
The earth is at its end. But you might have a solution…  

Your name is doctor Klouse. You have been in a lab for three years researching bio organic energies and the highly dangerous Bubble fusion theory. Over the years you’ve developed an Ai assistant to help you out with your research and to oversee security. You’ve seen some experiments go awry. There has been a few indecencies where some of the bio organic materials have crossed over with the highly reactive bubble fusion process.  So you need to be prepared for anything and everything.

This morning the you’ve woken up to the alarms… the last thing you wanted to hear.

“protocol phoenix”

As you rush to the main control console you hear the countdown.
